sections.title: Introduction & Role Context
sections.goal: Understand the interviewee's role in the Phoenix Feature Store project and initial responsibilities
sample_questions: Can you walk me through your role in the Phoenix Feature Store build phase?
What were your initial priorities when you joined this project?
How did you align with Novereon's values, particularly 'Safety First' and 'Sustainable Velocity'?

sections.title: Feature Store Architecture & Workflow
sections.goal: Explore the technical architecture, data pipelines, and model integration points
sample_questions: Could you describe the architecture for online and offline feature serving?
How do you manage the ingestion and transformation of features from various data sources?
What role does RFC-1419 'Time-Travel Features' play in your workflows?

sections.title: Model CI/CD and Deployment Practices
sections.goal: Understand how models are integrated, tested, and deployed using the feature store
sample_questions: How is model CI/CD implemented for Phoenix?
What guardrails or runbooks do you use to handle hotfix rollbacks (RB-FS-034)?
How do you ensure minimal blast radius when deploying new feature pipelines?

sections.title: Drift Monitoring and Incident Response
sections.goal: Discuss monitoring of data and model drift, and how incidents are handled
sample_questions: Can you explain your drift monitoring approach and thresholds?
How are alerts integrated into the SRE on-call process?
Could you share an example of a recent drift incident and how it was resolved?

sections.title: Cross-team Collaboration & Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify collaboration points with other teams and systems
sample_questions: Which other projects or teams does Phoenix depend on or feed into?
How do you coordinate with the Nimbus Observability or Helios Datalake teams?
Can you describe a case where coordination prevented a major issue?

sections.title: Risks, Trade-offs & Future Plans
sections.goal: Discuss strategic decisions, trade-offs, and planned improvements
sample_questions: What are the main risks in the current architecture and how are they mitigated?
Can you describe a trade-off you faced between performance and consistency?
What future enhancements are planned for Phoenix in the next release cycle?
